body_content.explanation: being cisgender (= having a gender that matches the body you were born with) and heterosexual (= sexually attracted to men if you are a woman and women if you are a man):
examples: In many ways, being cishet is still seen as the default in Western society.
The biases of the show's cishet male creators are visible.

body_content.explanation: involving people who are cisgender (= having a gender that matches the body you were born with) and heterosexual (= sexually attracted to men if you are a woman and women if you are a man):
examples: This problem is common in many cishet relationships.
The awareness of queer existence was rising in the cishet public consciousness.
